7ddae5ca-ec6b-423d-a4de-94969906f8e2.name: Universal
7ddae5ca-ec6b-423d-a4de-94969906f8e2.notes: Reaction modifier applies regardless of race

features.situation: from others who see your looks
from past victims and anyone with Empathy
to Interrogation and Intimidation rolls when you use threats or torture
from victims of your intolerance (may be as much as -5, at GM's discretion)

f2edcc76-0485-41f4-95c8-7783bc72acc2.name: Obsession (Destroy or totally control all non-elves)
f2edcc76-0485-41f4-95c8-7783bc72acc2.notes: Make a self-control roll whenever it would be wise to deviate from your goal. If you fail, you continue to pursue your Obsession, regardless of the consequences.

55c41ed7-ea3a-48d1-83a8-6e1004c4f212.text: Elf racial template from GURPS Banestorm
